post.text: Thank you Ohio - I love you! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Morgan
comment.text: I am from Ohio, and I can promise not all of Ohioans love you.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: That's OK Morgan. He still loves ALL of us though. I pray your heart will open, before it's too late. God bless! Trump/Pence Xoxoxoxoxo :)
